quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Mistakes are proof that you are trying.
author: Anonymous

quote: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not smart enough to debug it.
author: Brian Kernighan

quote: It is not how fast you run, but how far you run.
author: Anonymous

quote: Software is like entropy: it is easy to muddy things, but hard to keep them clean.
author: Anonymous

quote: The future depends on what you do today.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If you don't build your own dream, someone else will hire you to help build theirs.
author: Tony Gaskins

quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
author: Est√©e Lauder

quote: The best technology is that which you don't notice is there.
author: Anonymous

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss
